attributes.action: To commission a full public inquiry into historic sexual abuse by grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: The lack of institutional appetite for transparency and accountability necessitates a thorough inquiry into these horrendous crimes to Communities across the UK.
attributes.background: British Institutions have seriously let down our children who were horrifyingly abused by predominantly Pakistani men. They - the young girls - deserve justice & this inquiry must provide in full institutional failings, including CPS, Police, Councils & Social Services.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
